title: mula prakriti
sahitya:
mUla prAkrti rUpE mOkSapradE



anupallavi



kOlAhala sapta svara mAlAlankrtE malayadvaja sutE



caraNam



yashObhAgya samdhAtrE yantrAdhISTAna dEvatE shashIrSE dakSa kanyE

daharAkA camatyakE

pashu pAsha vimOcani poreyau bhakta janAbhISTa dAyini shashi cUDE

cakranutE harikEsha sahitE
